text:
I agree #NoOnRecall on Q1. 

Great to see grassroots Sunrise movement activists ignoring arrogant @CA_Dem edict to give up your voice on Q2 on who replacement candidate should be - Dismissing Voter Choice No Way to Win Recall Election https://t.co/FM609AsTXa #CARecall  @GPCA https://t.co/XMATFrYlPu
